column4: so, my GPU apparently handles up to 1920x1200, yet I only get the options up to 1366x768 (even for my bigger 40" TV that I have hooked up) is there something I can do to try and get the option for the 1920x1200 on my TV?
that's because your display only supports 1366x768, I think
huh, even for a Samsung 40" TV?
could be... check the manufacturers specs for the TV
